name: climatecharts_client
description: The ClimateCharts project is a Web Application divided into two parts:   1. The client-side webapp called "climatecharts-client", implemented in HTML, CSS and JavaScript   2. Three server-side applications implemented in Java:       2.1 "gazetteer": translates a set of GPS coordinates into a location name (e.g. "Weimar, Th√ºringen, Deutschland")       2.2 "thredds": the THREDDS Data Server (TDS) provides access to the actual climate data (temperature and precipitation per year)       2.3 "weatherstations": provides access to the database of weatherrstations, allows for requesting all at once and the climate data for one station in one time period
